channel.title: Shitmas
channel.description:
i spent 6 hours becoming the undisputed UFC champion in the Light Heavyweight division and discussing about my brothers asphalt business. Suddenly only my grandma comes in my room and says "i won't be here for Christmas" (im also 15 and live with her alone) and when she said that Rashad Evans fucking koed me with an uppercut.
So basically
Ill be spending Christmas alone
I'm 15
There is no alcohol in the house
No cigars
No nothing, just a bunch of bullshit
Merry shitmas everyone!
